text: sathyalingam mahathata ha dhiwara prawahana amathya pi.teniswaran mahathata siya rajakari watup laba ganimin manthri waraprasada himi bawa ema lipiyen danwa atha.

gunathmaka sancharaka ha gambauru paryeshana yana dekama sandaha nirmanaya kara athi dwaraya owun sangawunu manayan soya ganimata ida salasamin, kalaya ho awasthawak nomathi sandaha, kelinma amuththan bahutharaya wisin athdakina kala nohaki bawa riyo boho kon osse athathya binduma we nagaraya.

gedara thiyena muwa hamata thalanna wage hama unnahema oona waraddakata ethuma kendra karagena baninawa.eeth ethumage kale siwil aparadha pramanaya aar premadasa yugaye siwil aparadha pramanaya siyeyen beduwama ekakata samanayi. 1970 di pawathi samagi peramuna rajaya kalayata samana karanawa nam ekala athiwu siwil aparadha men siya gunayaka aparadha 1977 di balayata path che. aar. jayawardhana mathithumage palana kalayedi sidu wuna.
